i see nothing racist in those posts. one said """"losers"""" another said """"thugs"""" and """"get a job"""" and the other one had a meme that was the truth- cops have to protect themselves better now, because the risk of getting killed is higher   .  i'm not sure what's racist about that. no specific race was pointed out.    the protesters did commit a form of economic terrorism. businesses lost money because of these people.     the fact remains that breaking the law while protesting the law is counter-productive and does not help your cause.  more respect would have been given had the protest been held outside where a place was set up for it.

Fifty four percent of the Federal budget is spent on the military while our infrastructure and industrial base decays. We spend more on military then the next eleven highest spending nations spend combined. For all that, we should be pissed and screaming, not cowering in fear. A laughably transparent conman demagogue like Trump calls the military a 'disaster', and all the suckers just swallow it right up. But I support Trump on one thing, it is time for Germany, France, England, and Japan to pay their fare share of national defense.

Carter, you earned those beautiful battle scars. Be proud of every one of them. You fought the fierce battle and came out a winner! Our seven year old great granddaughter went through open heart surgery and shows off her scar. God is watching over you, Carter, and even though those scars are visible, you have such beauty on the inside. Those scars will fade in time, not all the way, but everytime you see them in the mirror, just remember that when God brings you to it, He will bring you through it. Good luck, young man, our prayers go out to you. There will be so many kids asking to see them, and admire you for what you have been through.
